attributes.action: Set up a democratic organisation to represent the UKs 40 million road users, and democratise camera partnerships
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should set up a democratic organisation, similar to statutory and other public transport user groups, to properly represent the UKs 40 million+ road users on ALL  issues. There should also be democratic representation provided on all camera partnerships as part of this, similar to the government's highly successful Community Rail Strategy, where public involvement has completely transformed the previous unsatisfactory situation.
